text: High GRIm-Score was an independent prognostic biomarker of OS of first-line cytotoxic chemotherapy for wild-type EGFR adenocarcinoma and of PFS of first- or second-generation EGFR-TKI for EGFR-mutant NSCLC. Therefore, GRIm-Score is not only a specific selection marker for experimental immunotherapy trials, but may also be a promising and useful pretreatment prognostic maker for specific NSCLC subsets in the real-world practice.
